As a WPF developer, is WindowsPresentation the correct library to use? Which caching method is ideal?
there is no mono for wpf, no compilation symboms

With no compilation symbols, it runs fine on my developer machine, but when I try it on a laptop the map is tiled with the error:

Exception: Could not load file or assembly 'System.Data.SqlServerCe'

Hence my confusion!
